name: Mozzle
description:
***** Mozzle (MOtion puZZLE), the coolest jigsaw puzzles on the appstore.

Featured by Apple in New and Noteworthy.
100,000 players and 200 worldwide reviews on iTunes with an average rating of 4.5 stars.

"At first I was skeptical. I was pleasantly surprised to discover that a game with such a simple concept could be so fun and compelling to play." (iTunes review by Jonathan Ng 5/5)

Mozzle uses every type of user input on an iOS device (touch screen, accelerometer, camera, microphone) to provide an experience you've never lived before.

"Mozzle is a fantastically creative take on the classic sliding tile game where the tiles are brought to life with movement." (simple-reviews.com 5/5)

Gameplay video : http://youtu.be/y8GBPKQY-fc

* Exclusive soundtrack
* 23 unique interactive / motion puzzles
* 3 mini games (with Game Center leaderboards)
* Universal (iPhone / iPad)
* Compatible with first gen devices
* Optimized for iPhone 4 Retina display
* Designed for the iPhone / iPod / iPad (use of the accelerometer, camera, microphone - you can play the game without the camera or the microphone)
* 5 difficulty levels
* Game Center leaderboards


More levels are added regularly in free updates
Developer news on twitter @jpsarda
Game news @mozzlegame
Online experiment on your desktop (scrambled Vimeo video) : http://vimeozzle.com/
